name: Custom Deck
description:
Custom Deck allows you to play any card-based game in your FigJam


Features

  • Create a custom card deck from a text file
  • Change the color of a deck (allows you to have multiple decks in one FigJam and not confuse them)
  • Take cards from a deck
  • Flip cards
  • Peek a card (allows a person to quickly view the contents of a card without flipping it)
